description: Comprehensive extraction of mortgage loan application including personal details, employment, financial status, and property information for loan underwriting and approval.

home_phone.instruction: Home phone number from Contact Information section on page 1

cell_phone.instruction: Cell phone number from Contact Information section on page 1

work_phone.instruction: Work phone number from Contact Information section on page 1

email_address.instruction: Email address from Contact Information section on page 1

applicant_name.instruction: Full name of applicant (first, middle, last, and suffix) from Personal Information section on page 1

ssn.instruction: 9-digit Social Security Number from Personal Information section on page 1

alternate_names.instruction: Any other names the applicant is known by from Personal Information section on page 1

date_of_birth.instruction: Date of birth in mm/dd/yyyy format from Personal Information section on page 1

citizenship_status.instruction: Citizenship status (USC: U.S. Citizen, PRA: Permanent Resident Alien, NPRA: Non-Permanent Resident Alien) from Personal Information section on page 1

credit_application.instruction: Type of credit (Individual or Joint) and total number of borrowers if joint application from Personal Information section on page 1

marital_status.instruction: Marital status (M: Married, S: Separated, U: Unmarried) from Personal Information section on page 1

dependents.instruction: Number and ages of dependents (e.g., '2 dependents: ages 4, 7') from Personal Information section on page 1

contact_information.instruction: Contact information including home phone, cell phone, work phone and email address from Contact Information section on page 1

current_address.instruction: Complete current address including street, unit, city, state, zip and country from Current Address section on page 1

current_address_duration.instruction: Time at current address (years and months) from Current Address section on page 1

housing.instruction: Housing status (Own, Rent, or No primary housing expense) and monthly payment amount from Housing section on page 1

employment_status.instruction: If employment section applies and whether applicant is business owner/self-employed from Current Employment section on page 2

employer_name.instruction: Name of employer or business from Current Employment section on page 2

employer_phone.instruction: Phone number of the employer from Current Employment section on page 2

employer_address.instruction: Complete employer address including street, unit, city, state, zip and country from Current Employment section on page 2

employment_details.instruction: Position title, start date, and duration in this line of work from Current Employment section on page 2

income_base.instruction: Base monthly income in dollars from Monthly Income section on page 2

income_overtime.instruction: Overtime monthly income in dollars from Monthly Income section on page 2

income_bonus.instruction: Bonus monthly income in dollars from Monthly Income section on page 2

income_commission.instruction: Commission monthly income in dollars from Monthly Income section on page 2

income_military.instruction: Military entitlements monthly income in dollars from Monthly Income section on page 2

income_other.instruction: Other monthly income in dollars from Monthly Income section on page 2

income_total.instruction: Total gross monthly income in dollars from Monthly Income section on page 2

total_assets_value.instruction: Total value of all assets from Financial Information section on page 3

total_liabilities_amount.instruction: Total amount of all liabilities from Financial Information section on page 3

loan_details.instruction: Loan amount and purpose (Purchase, Refinance, or Other with description) from Loan and Property Information section on page 4

property_address.instruction: Complete property address including street, unit, city, state, zip and county from Loan and Property Information section on page 4

property_characteristics.instruction: Number of units and estimated property value in dollars from Loan and Property Information section on page 4

property_occupancy.instruction: How the property will be occupied from Loan and Property Information section on page 4

property_usage.instruction: Whether property is mixed-use and/or a manufactured home from Loan and Property Information section on page 4
